#: Add CONTRIBUTING.md

Description
-----------
Write a `CONTRIBUTING.md` file that explains how to set up the project locally, run tests, lint, and submit a pull request. Include branch naming or commit message guidelines (optional) and links to the Code of Conduct.

Acceptance criteria
-------------------
- `CONTRIBUTING.md` exists at the repository root.
- It contains clear setup steps for frontend and backend (docker-compose, npm install, prisma migrate, seed, run servers).
- It explains how to run tests and linters and the expected PR workflow.

Labels: `good first issue`, `docs`
